name: @soundws/audiowaveform-lambda-layer
author: The First Coders Team (https://www.firstcoders.co.uk)
description: Static build of BBC audiowaveform packaged as a Lambda layer.

scripts.prepack: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist/aws-sam && cp -R .aws-sam/build dist/aws-sam
scripts.sam:publish: npm run build && sam package --output-template-file packaged.yaml --s3-bucket $AWS_SAM_PACKAGE_BUCKET_NAME --region $AWS_REGION && sam publish --template packaged.yaml --region $AWS_REGION --semantic-version $npm_package_version
